import React from 'react' import {Card,Button, CardGroup,Row,Col} from'react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEdit, faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function AvailableVenue() { return ( {Array.from({ length: 10 }).map((_, idx) => (
VenueName: Wankhade Stadium
Location: Mumbai -420004
Venue Capacity: 5000
Venue description:
The stadium now has a capacity of 33,108 following renovations for the 2011 Cricket World Cup.Before the upgrade, the capacity was approximately 45,000.
))} ) } export default AvailableVenue;
